servinfo.title: Fuel Filter and Fuel Heater Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Disconnect fuel heater connector (1) and fuel filter water detection sensor connector (2).
Clean filter and its surrounding area.
Pull out fuel hoses (3) with pushing lock button (4).
Plug fuel hoses, fuel filter (5) and fuel heater with plug cap according to Precautions on Fuel System Service for parts number and handling.
Remove fuel filter (5) from its bracket (6).
Remove fuel heater (1) and fuel filter (2) from fuel filter case (3).
Clean fuel heater and fuel filter case.
Install fuel heater (1) and fuel filter (2) to fuel filter case (3) after applying diesel fuel to its new O-rings (4).

attention2.ptxt: Be sure to position claw (5) of the fuel filter case (3) to such position of the fuel heater(1) as shown in the figure.
If fuel pipes (fuel heater) are not positioned as specified, an abnormal force is applied to the fuel hoses and may cause damage to them.

s1.ptxt: Install fuel filter (1) to its bracket.
Remove plug cup from fuel hoses (2) and fuel filter.
Connect fuel hoses to fuel filter.
Connect fuel heater connector (3) and fuel filter water detection sensor (4).
Bleed air in fuel system referring to Air Bleeding of Fuel System .
Check fuel leakage referring to Fuel Leakage Check Procedure .
